summary:
FC Porto, based in Porto, Portugal, is a renowned sports club, especially for its professional football team. Founded in 1893, it's one of the top three teams in Portugal. They are known as the "Dragons" due to their crest and wear blue and white stripes. Porto has won many trophies, including 30 Portuguese league titles and two UEFA Champions League titles. They play at the Estádio do Dragão.

Internationally, Porto has excelled, winning the UEFA Cup/Europa League twice and the UEFA Super Cup in 1987. Their success ranks them among Europe's top clubs.
title: FC Porto
